Blog.post: haiz todae is an upsetting dae for me.. im moodless agn.. i dun hv the mood to talk n chat or watsoever.. no mood to eat.. nor surfing some internet sites.. totally moodless.. n e reason is............. god knws.. dunnoe y todae cry so much.. is nt tt much bt.. haiz.. sec 1 already leh! stil cry.. k la.. i todae totally no mood becuz of.......... maths paper.. i didnt complete it on time.. n im only on pg 6.. i lost marks for 3 pages.. whole set gt 9 pgs.. i only stop halfway at pg 6.. when teacher sae times up tears rolling down my cheek le.. bt i keep like u knw, look up n rub away the tears la.. later ppl see thought i siao liao.. den teacher collect my paper.. whoa tt moment really wanna cry badly.. den dismissed for break straight away go toilet.. cry cry bt, try to stop myself la.. den after tt go out.. den i was like "oh shit!".. i totally forgot abt khai n siti.. juz go off without them.. bt luckily they were outside toilet waiting for me.. they sae they saw me.. heng sia.. i thought they saw me cry.. lol!! no one saw.. only god.. bleahzx.. bt nw i feel like, u knw, damn stupid to cry over a maths paper.. wats e use manz.. i mean.. i really hope tt i get A1 for it lo.. fri gt maths paper 2.. dun feel like going to sch.. i knw tt i cnt get A1 le.. n i will forever knw tt.. see, ytd i so damn confident tt my maths gonna score A1.. bt nw, i only aiming B4.. nt more.. if higher then, tnk god lo.. A2 oso no hope la.. the wae to release stress??? on boiler full blast!!! n nw im doing tt.. so damn fucked up.. really release my stress la.. bt i cnt hear any phone calls or my hp gt msg n calls.. i dun care.. i hv no mood to talk to anyone.. except myself.. memang betul aku gila.. haiz.. juz nw go sch by taxi.. go home oso take taxi.. feeling a bit rich huh.. lol!! no la.. todae i lazy to take bus.. heee... i dun think im gonna make it to sec 2.. i dunnoe y bt.. juz feel like tt.. bt i pray hard tt i wud be promoted to sec 2.. i dun care go nt or na.. as long as i go to sec 2.. bt next yr my whole class going to 2A.. den sec 3 we split.. hee.. i wanna complete my sec sch in A class.. or even B.. bt pls, no C or lower.. i hate it.. gonna maintain.. like my pri sch.. 2b 3a 4b 5b1 6b1.. smart huh? lolz!! act.. den yea todae as per normal.. life goes on like tt.. tmr going home at 0945.. i wanna watch troy.. bt dunnoe hu to go out with.. khai bt she cnt.. bt she gonna watch it though.. some other time, she sae.. k la.. den ask atikah, she sae its damn boring.. cuz its related to hist.. bt i find tt story interesting lo.. bt actually huh, truthfully, i dun find hist sucks.. is juz tt we need to learn abt the ppl n e systems like a historian.. tts y sucks.. if we juz listen to grandmother story, den very shiok one.. like mr law tt time tell us the story abt troy.. nice sia til i wanna watch.. oh yea i think gt tell before, june holidaes rohani organising this gathering thingy.. n im invited!! lolz!! happy seh.. she sae she bringing her chat frens.. and i was like =X =X =X ... heee.... ok i dun mind, bt hopefully they arent a bunch of pervertic gals n boys.. i oso dunnoe if i cn make it anot.. well, just see.. k.. todae's lit was nt tt bad.. im sumkinda confident tt i cn pass the exam, or even beat cherylette? heee.. hu knws.. bleahzx i nth to comment abt.. juz tt todae is a bad dae for me.. feels like maths sucks bt it doesnt.. no matter wat n no matter hw u sucks, i will forever love u.. -maths.. hee!!! think wat? ........ todae's quote: the worst wae to miss someone is sitting beside him knowing that u cant have him..
